name: Fountain Valley
shortDescription: A vibrant suburban city known for parks, family-friendly neighborhoods, and easy access to beaches.
fullDescription: Located in Orange County, Fountain Valley offers a blend of residential comfort and recreational amenities. The city is renowned for its numerous parks, top-rated schools, and community events. With convenient freeway access to Huntington Beach and Costa Mesa, Fountain Valley appeals to families and professionals seeking a balanced suburban lifestyle close to the coast.
heroImageAlt: Park area in Fountain Valley with green trees and walking paths

neighborhoods.name: Huntington Beach
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city famous for surfing, beaches, and a lively downtown.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Beach and pier in Huntington Beach

neighborhoods.name: Costa Mesa
neighborhoods.description: Dynamic city known for arts, shopping, and diverse dining.

neighborhoods.name: Westminster
neighborhoods.description: Cultural hub with vibrant Vietnamese community and shopping centers.

neighborhoods.name: Garden Grove
neighborhoods.description: Family-oriented city with parks, schools, and cultural festivals.

highlights.title: Fountain Valley Park
highlights.description: Large community park with playgrounds, sports fields, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Green open space at Fountain Valley Park

highlights.title: Huntington Beach Access
highlights.description: Short drive to world-famous beaches, surfing spots, and oceanfront dining.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Surfer catching waves at Huntington Beach

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Annual festivals, farmers markets, and cultural events bring residents together.

faqs.question: What is Fountain Valley known for?
faqs.answer: Fountain Valley is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, parks, and proximity to the coast.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Fountain Valley?
faqs.answer: The city is served by highly-rated Fountain Valley School District with several top public schools.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are available?
faqs.answer: Residents enjoy parks, walking trails, and quick access to Huntington Beach for surfing and swimming.

faqs.question: How is the commute from Fountain Valley?
faqs.answer: Easy freeway access to nearby cities like Costa Mesa and Huntington Beach makes commuting convenient.
